title: Remove Lockfiles

title: Update PackageCard to conditionally load images based on default view
description: Updates the PackageCard component to conditionally load images based on the default view specified, defaulting to a 3D view if the specified view is not available.

title: patch CmdKMenu to redirect to package view then editor
description: Changes the redirection behavior in CmdKMenu to navigate to the package view instead of the editor directly when a package is selected.

title: Follow up fix for meta data coming undefined
description: Fixes issue where package metadata was coming back as undefined in the API response.
body: fix

title: 404 status for package-view
description: Fixes the handling of 404 errors for package views by returning a custom HTML response instead of throwing an error.
body: fix #1431

title: Prevent! runframe rerender, for mobile ux and dx
description: Fixes the issue where the RunFrame component would rerender unnecessarily on mobile devices, improving user experience and developer experience.

title: fix local trending page, only for local & MINOR FOLLOW UP FIXES
description: Fixes the local trending page by ensuring it correctly filters and sorts packages based on star count, and includes minor adjustments to the EditorNav component.

title: CodeEditor and GlobalFindReplace components to support line navigation
description: Adds support for line navigation in the CodeEditor and GlobalFindReplace components, allowing users to navigate directly to specific lines in files.

title: Rename snippet base url to packages keyword
description: Renames the snippet base URL hook to use the packages keyword instead of snippets, ensuring consistency across the codebase.

title: conditionally render package type and visibility options for the owner
description: Adds conditional rendering for package type and visibility options based on the owners GitHub username, allowing the owner to change the package type and visibility settings.

title: New import dialog from runframe
description: Adds a new import dialog for components from Runframe, allowing users to select and import components directly into the code editor.
body:
